channel.title: Hd 508 server right click options mix up
channel.description:
I have recently started a 508 Hd and im hosting on a very good dedi server. I came to a problem when preping my client for my players, it seems that when you right click objects it has twice the options as normal. Can anyone give me a little hint in the right direction?
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/20kx001.jpg[/img]
